title: Random Lag/Freeze!
body:
Can someone help me pls? i got  random freeze only last game i played, here is the r3dlog.
[2016-10-16T20-46-31_r3dlog](http://pastebin.com/raw/2N9h6Br3)

replies.body: Can you describe the freezing and "lag" a bit more? Did you notice any changes in your FPS or latency (ms)? Did you get any *attempting to reconnect* messages?
No i didn't notice any fps or ping changes, the game just freeze randomly for 1 second. Can you read the log pls?

Unfortunately, the log doesn't provide full context. My best guess with the current information and log is that there may be issues with your drivers or hardware, so you should work through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).

Let me know if your issue persists.
